Package com.project.ardrone_android_geii

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JoystickMovedListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorDetector_OpenCV
    Class managing OpenCV processing for color detection.
    Drone_UI
    Class managing the Drone Piloting Activity UI.
    DroneManager
    Class who handle communication with the Drone (UDP Protocols and AT Commands)
    DroneManager_OpenCV
    Class derived from DroneManager to enable OpenCV features on the application.
    DroneUI_OpenCV
    Class derived from Drone_UI managing the Drone Piloting Activity UI with OpenCV features enabled.
    JoystickCommandManager
    Class handling the commands from the virtual Joysticks.
    JoystickView
    Class creating a draggable joystick on the screen.
    Menu_UI
    Class managing the Main Menu UI of the Application.
    PhotoSaver
    Class allowing to get a frame from the MediaPlayer which streams the video and save it into the local storage of the device.
    PhysicalJoystickManager
    Class handling inputs for bluetooth physical controllers.
    SensorData_Receiver
    Class handling data received from the Drone's sensors.
    SettingsManager
    Class handling the settings tab UI.
    ThreadsManager
    Class managing the different threads of the application.
    ThreadsManager_OpenCV
    Class derived from ThreadsManager managing the different threads of the application with OpenCV features enabled.
    VideoManager
    Class managing the video stream coming from the Drone.
    VideoManager_OpenCV
    Class derived from VideoManager managing the video stream coming from the Drone with OpenCv features enabled.
